 16     
 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new link-hotspot instance.
 19  *
 20  * @class A labeled hotspot that takes the user to another
 21  * location when it is clicked on. See {@link bigshot.HotspotLayer} for 
 22  * examples.
 23  *
 24  * @see bigshot.HotspotLayer
 25  * @param {number} x x-coordinate of the top-left corner, given in full image pixels
 26  * @param {number} y y-coordinate of the top-left corner, given in full image pixels
 27  * @param {number} w width of the hotspot, given in full image pixels
 28  * @param {number} h height of the hotspot, given in full image pixels
 29  * @param {String} labelText text of the label
 30  * @param {String} url url to go to on click
 31  * @augments bigshot.LabeledHotspot
 32  * @constructor
 33  */
 34 bigshot.LinkHotspot = function (x, y, w, h, labelText, url) {
 35     bigshot.LabeledHotspot.call (this, x, y, w, h, labelText);
 36     this.browser.registerListener (this.getElement (), "click", function () {
 37             document.location.href = url;
 38         });
 39 };
 40 
 41 bigshot.Object.extend (bigshot.LinkHotspot, bigshot.LabeledHotspot);
 42
